name: Chromolucuma brevipedicellata
locality: Mun. Rio Preto da Eva, ARIE-PDBFF, Estrada ZF-3, Sítio amostral Km-37, Parcela CTFS-25ha, Quadrante 200 × 120, 150 m
remarks: doi:10.1007/s12228-021-09663-y The specific epithet refers to the length of the pedicels, which is shorter than in congeneric species.
